document.discussion_title: Hearthstone update: Blizzard prepare Whispers of the Old Gods release date with new patch
document.topic_text: Hearthstone update: Blizzard prepare Whispers of the Old Gods release date with new patch Watch live video from PlayHearthstone on www.twitch.tv The latest expansion for the popular online game arrives on April 26 in North America and will introduce 134 new cards in the title’s third DLC. Whispers of the Old Gods doesn’t land in Europe and Asia until April 27 for Windows and Mac PCs, iOS and Android Tablets, and mobile phones, while pre-purchased card bundles can be opened on its official release.
